views¶

views.allApplications(request)[source]¶

View for displaying all the loan applications a customer has made. These applications include those which have been approved, rejected or are under consideration.

views.allLoans(request)[source]¶

Show all loans for a customer.

views.allPayments(request)[source]¶

View for displaying all payments made by a customer in reverse chronological order

views.cancelOrArchive(request, cancelOrArchive, applicationID)[source]¶

View for cancelling or archiving an application. Redirects back to allApplications.

views.dueInstallments(request)[source]¶

View for displaying all due and/or overdue installments for all loans of a customer.

views.home(request)[source]¶

Home page for a unsigned user.

views.loanDetails(request, loanId)[source]¶

Display the loan details for a loanId

views.newApplication(request)[source]¶

Files a new application.

views.newApplicationThanks(request)[source]¶

Thank you page after a new application request.

views.payInstallment(request, loanId)[source]¶

View for paying an installment

views.payInstallmentThanks(request)[source]¶

Redirects to thank you page after the payment of an installment.

views.payPrepayment(request, loanId)[source]¶

Prepay an amount for a loan.

views.payPrepaymentThanks(request)[source]¶

Thank you page after the payment of an installment.

views.support(request)[source]¶

View for filing a support request.

views.supportThanks(request)[source]¶

Thank you page after a support request submission.
